name: Aching Back
value: You are fatigued.

name: Aim Carefully Next Time
value: For 3 rounds, you must spend a full-round action to make a single attack.

name: All Thumbs
value: You lose your Dex bonus on attack rolls for 3 rounds.

name: Amazing Miss
value: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates).

name: Archer's Elbow
value: You take a -2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls for 1d4 minutes.

name: Awkward Attack
value: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

name: Backfire
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Bad Alignment
value: You take a -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).

name: Broken
value: Your weapon is destroyed (Ref negates). Magic weapons use their own save bonus.

name: Bull's Eye
value: Your shot ricochets and hits you near the eye. You are blinded for 1 round.

name: Close To The Ear
value: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check).

name: Cracked
value: Your weapon (not ammunition) takes 1d6 of damage, ignoring damage.

name: Don't Hit Me!
value: For 3 rounds, you take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attacks for each ally in melee combat with your target.

name: Double Miss
value: You use twice as much ammunition on this attack.

name: Errant Aim
value: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).

name: Everything You Got
value: You are exhausted (Fort negates).

name: Friendly Fire
value: You attack hits your ally closest to the target.

name: Head Rush
value: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds.

name: Huh?
value: You are confused for 1 round.

name: In The Line Of Fire
value: You attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Insecure
value: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls for 1d4 days or until you score a critical hit.

name: Klutz
value: You drop your weapon.

name: Lost Grip
value: You can only take a move action next round.

name: Lost The Target
value: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

name: Lowered Guard
value: You provoke attacks of opportunity from all threatening foes.

name: Misjudged The Distance
value: All attack rolls beyond the first range increment have triple the normal distance penalty for 3 rounds.

name: Mix It Up
value: You are unable to make ranged attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.

name: My Spleeny Bits!
value: You take 1 point of CON damage.

name: Nicked
value: You take 1 point of bleed.

name: Not My Pony
value: Your attack hits the nearest allied animal or mount.

name: Notched Fingers
value: You take 1d6 points of bleed.

name: Overcompensate
value: All targets with cover gain an additional +4 bonus to AC against you for 3 rounds.

name: Overthrow
value: If attack was made with a thrown weapon, the weapon travels 5x its range increment in a random direction.

name: Phantom Wind
value: You compensate for a breeze which isn't there. You take a -2 penalty on ranged attack rolls for 3 rounds.

name: Pinch In Parts
value: You take 1d6 points of damage.

name: Recoil
value: You move backward 1 square and fall prone.

name: Seeing Double
value: All your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1 round.

name: Shot Your Foot
value: You take 1d2 points of DEX damage and your speed is reduced by half until healed.

name: Snapped String
value: If attack was made with a bow or crossbow, the string breaks and required 1d3 rounds to fix.

name: So Much Blood
value: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds.

name: Spilled Ammo
value: Your ammunition falls from its container and takes 1d6 rounds to gather up.

name: Sprain
value: You take 1d4 points of DEX damage.

name: Tied Up
value: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

name: Torn Tendon
value: You take 1 point of DEX bleed (Fort negates).

name: Tunnel Vision
value: For the next 3 rounds, you have a +1 bonus to attack rolls, but you are flat-footed.

name: Um, Oops
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Weapon Jam
value: If using a projectile weapon it does not function. Spend 1 standard action to clear.

name: What Are The Odds?
value: If you made a thrown attack, you hit the target, but the weapon ends up in the target's possession.

name: Whoops!
value: You are knocked prone.

name: Wide Open
value: You are flat-footed for 1 round.

name: Wrong Weapon
value: If you made a thrown attack, you throw a random object from your gear.

name: You'll Shoot Your Eye Out
value: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
